name: Asphalt Drifting Racing Mania
description:
Do you think you have what it takes?
Calling all racers for a blast of Arcade and console experience in the palm of your hand. Immersive your self in the hyper-realistic environment, test your skills and enjoy the nonparallel asphalt racing experience.

You will race around sand hills, charge through canyons, drift across the dirt and climb past your opponents to reach the finish line as part of absolutely extreme racing.

Features...
*Race in beautiful and unique city districts.
*Dominate insane rivals in extreme head-to-head races!.
*Super Cars with easy controls and upgrade-able turbo engine along with other upgrades.
*Many Racing Modes (Include Career, Elimination, 1 Vs 1, Time Trial).
*Plenty of sports cars and off-road tracks.
*Realistic 3D graphics, best driving physics, and sound effect.
